title: Happiness
verses: Psalm 1:1-2 (WEB) — "Blessed is the man who doesn’t walk in the counsel of the wicked, nor stand in the way of sinners, nor sit in the seat of scoffers; but his delight is in Yahweh’s law. On his law he meditates day and night."
Psalm 144:15 (WEB) — "Happy are the people who are in such a situation. Happy are the people whose God is Yahweh."
Proverbs 3:13 (WEB) — "Happy is the man who finds wisdom, the man who gets understanding."
Matthew 5:6 (WEB) — "Blessed are those who hunger and thirst after righteousness, for they shall be filled."
John 13:17 (WEB) — "If you know these things, blessed are you if you do them."
body: Happiness in Scripture is blessedness—delighting in God, walking in His wisdom, and doing what He says. Joy deepens as obedience becomes your way of life.
prayer: Father, tune my happiness to Your heart. Teach me to delight in Your Word and to practice it with glad obedience. Amen.
